markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Guarded Thoughts](/Feats.aspx?ID=3992) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 50</row>

</column>

---

Your mind, like a [dark naga's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=306), foils attempts to read your thoughts. Any effect that specifically attempts to read your mind to glean information must succeed at a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against the higher of your class DC or your spell DC to do so successfully; otherwise, it gains no information. The counteract level is equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Guarded Thoughts
